name: Party Hard - Demo
description:
"Você recobra a consciência e lembra-se de estar festejando com amigos, mas que lugar é esse? onde foram todos?"

Jogo de terror desenvolvido durante a Game Jam da Fiap 2021.

- In English -

"You regain consciousness and the only thing you remember it's that you were partying with friends, but what is this place? where did everyone go?"

Horror game developed during Fiap's Game Jam 2021.
